message: Will the windows(Cross Mobile OS) of Mobile smart phones ever happen??

data.message: Why not, Laptop that's designed by different companies can work with any OS. I don't know why wouldn't that happen for Mobile. The best OS for mobile in my opinion is Chrome OS, it would be perfect.

Well, Apple and Android will continue to fight for a larger market share but i think both will continue to be present unless JAVA and OBJECTIVE-C are deprecated and replaced with 1 superior programming language. and even if that happened both companies will develop their own OS based on it and market it as the better OS for your Phone. so in short NO.
There should be a company that comes up and challenge that. It would gain a lot of shares and support for its flexibility that same as Windows.
The day Apple decides to open-source iOS, I promise you.
It's called Linux, Android, Ubuntu Phone/Touch
